response: (verbatim_utterance="Let's start the grocery shopping task. Here's the list. Can you find the items on this table?", nonverbal_behavior=[Hands shopping list to participant], ready_to_continue=false, current_step=0, final_step=false)

(forgetfulness_status=yes, frustration_status=no, anger_status=no, engagement_status=yes, verbal_utterance="Let me see...where do I begin?", nonverbal_behavior=[takes the list, squints at it, seems to be trying to focus, looks around the table slowly])

(verbal_utterance="Can you find any item from the list on this table?", nonverbal_behavior=[Points to items on the table, maintains a calm and friendly demeanor], ready_to_continue=false, current_step=0, final_step=false)

(forgetfulness_status=yes, frustration_status=no, anger_status=no, engagement_status=yes, verbal_utterance="Um, let's see... milk, was it?" nonverbal_behavior=[Scans the table slowly, eyebrows furrowed in concentration])

(verbal_utterance="You're doing well! Can you identify any of the items on your list from what's on the table?", nonverbal_behavior=[Points gently towards the items on the table], ready_to_continue=false, current_step=0, final_step=false)

(forgetfulness_status=yes, frustration_status=no, anger_status=no, engagement_status=yes, verbal_utterance="Oh, let me see...", nonverbal_behavior=[furrowed brow, scanning the items on table with a hesitant hand])

(forgetfulness_status=yes, frustration_status=yes, anger_status=no, engagement_status=yes, verbal_utterance="I... oh, my, what was I looking for again?", nonverbal_behavior=[furrows brow, looks around the table puzzled, makes repeated unsuccessful attempts to pick up items])

(verbal_utterance="You're looking for the milk right now. What does the milk container look like?", nonverbal_behavior=[Gestures to guide their attention towards the dairy section on the table], ready_to_continue=false, current_step=1, final_step=false)

(forgetfulness_status=yes, frustration_status=no, anger_status=no, engagement_status=yes, verbal_utterance="Oh... the milk?", nonverbal_behavior=[Looks around the table uncertainly, then points hesitantly at a carton])

(verbal_utterance="That's right, the list mentions milk. Does that carton you're pointing to match what's on the list?", nonverbal_behavior=[Gestures towards the carton and then back to the list to encourage comparison], ready_to_continue=false, current_step=1, final_step=false)

(forgetfulness_status=yes, frustration_status=yes, anger_status=no, engagement_status=yes, verbal_utterance="Oh dear, there are so many cartons here. Is this the milk...no that's not it...", nonverbal_behavior=[shuffling items on the table, a slight frown, looks to interventionist for assistance])

(verbal_utterance="You're doing great. Can you try finding the milk again? It might be in a carton or a plastic jug.", nonverbal_behavior=[Points lightly toward the milk area, providing gentle guidance with a calm expression], ready_to_continue=false, current_step=0, final_step=false)

(verbal_utterance="You're doing great. What item does the list say first?", nonverbal_behavior=[Smiles reassuringly, points gently to the list in the patient's hand], ready_to_continue=false, current_step=1, final_step=false)

(verbal_utterance="You're doing well. What's the first item on the list that you need to find?", nonverbal_behavior=[Smiles reassuringly, gestures towards the list to help the patient focus on it], ready_to_continue=true, current_step=1, final_step=false)
